name: Startersite
body:
A MVC starter site with better membership out the box 

This site uses MVC 3 and microsofts updated membership providers.

1. It contains pages for editing users details 
2. It is setup to store in sql compact 
3. It has elmah included using sql compact
tagline: An MVC site with better membership support out the box
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
